price: Ìran ‘Ād pé òdodo ní irọ́. Báwo ni ìyà Mi àti ìkìlọ̀ Mi ti rí ná (lára wọn)?
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat ʿādun fakayfa kāna ʿadhābī wanudhuri
